description: If you're in the mood for Mediterranean fare, the Little Greek Food Truck is serving up some of the best tasting locally sourced Greek dishes in Dallas. Their items include various pita sandwiches, a pita burger, chicken and beef skewers, and for the vegetarians, a tasty greek salad. Follow up your meal with the traditional sweet Greek pastry, baklava, and you'll be in heaven.To read how the Little Greek Food Truck made Lower Greenville cool again, read the Roaming Hunger blog here: http://roaminghunger.com/blog/6100/dallas-contributor-gina-gandy-sounds-off-on-the-little-greek-food-truck
name: Little Greek Food Truck
